::Shredder::

Shredder looks down at the terrain below him as he flies toward the 
Pred base, his eyes widening when he sees Mantella. He lands near her.

"You allright?" he asks, looking down and trying to figure out how 
damaged she was.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> Mantella
> 
> 
> 
> 
> (Mantella wasn't far from the old location of the destron base 
since she was slowly walking. She falls to her knees. She looks at 
her rifle. She slowly removes it from it's holder. She decides it's 
for the best. She aims the rifle at her stomach, firing one shot. It 
enters from the front and leaves from the back. She slowly puts her 
rifle back in it's holder. She smiles sighing. She lays on her back. 
Mech fluid leaving her body quickly. Mantella lays there enjoying the 
last and the best parts of her life. Soon it would all be over...)
